<div id="hs_cos_wrapper_module_163298605646052" class="hs_cos_wrapper hs_cos_wrapper_widget hs_cos_wrapper_type_module" style="" data-hs-cos-general-type="widget" data-hs-cos-type="module">
  
  
  

<header x-data="{
init() {
  if(document.cookie.indexOf('visitorCountry=') != '-1' && document.cookie.indexOf('show_language_bar=') != '-1') {
    this.show_language_bar = false; 
    return;
  }

  if (document.cookie.indexOf('show_language_bar=') !== -1) {
    let cookie_show_language_bar = document.cookie.split('; ').find(row => row.startsWith('show_language_bar=')).split('=')[1];
    if(cookie_show_language_bar === 'false') {
      this.show_language_bar = false; 
      return;
    }
  }

  if(document.cookie.indexOf('visitorCountry=') == '-1') {

  
    fetch('https://visitor-lang.shiftbase.com/')
    .then(response => response.text())
      .then(data => {
          //const countryCode = data.match(/\$\$(.*)\$\$/).pop();
          const countryCode = data.toLowerCase();
          createCookie('visitorCountry', countryCode, 14);
          this.languageSuggest();
      });
      return;
  
  } 
  this.languageSuggest();
},
available_locales: {'en':{locale: 'en', slug: ''},'de':{locale: 'de', slug: 'de/'},'es':{locale: 'es', slug: 'es/'},'fr':{locale: 'fr', slug: 'fr/'},'nl':{locale: 'nl', slug: 'nl/'}},
current_locale: 'en',
show_search: false,
visitorCountry: 'en',
src: 'https://www.shiftbase.com',
domain: 'https://www.shiftbase.com/',
language_suggest: 'en',
show_language_bar: false,
isLoading: false,
hasScrolled: false,
dropMenu: false,
openMenu(menu){
  if(this.dropMenu && this.dropMenu === menu){
      this.dropMenu = false;
  }else{
      this.dropMenu = menu;
  }
},
languageSuggest() {

  // Check for multilanguage alternatives
  if (Object.keys(this.available_locales).length > 1) {

    // Browser language
    var userLangResponse = navigator.language || navigator.userLanguage;
    var visitorLanguage = userLangResponse.substring(0, 2);

    var visitorCountry = getCookie('visitorCountry');

    if (''+visitorLanguage+'-'+visitorCountry+'' == this.current_locale || ''+visitorLanguage+'' == this.current_locale) {
      this.show_language_bar = false;
      return;
    }

    if (this.available_locales[''+visitorLanguage+'-'+visitorCountry+'']) {
      this.language_suggest = ''+visitorLanguage+'-'+visitorCountry+'';    
    }

    if (this.available_locales[''+visitorCountry+'']) {
      this.language_suggest = ''+visitorCountry+'';
    }

    if (this.available_locales[''+this.visitorLanguage+'']) {
      this.language_suggest = ''+this.visitorLanguage+'';
    }

    if (this.available_locales[''+this.visitorLanguage+'-'+this.visitorLanguage+'']) {
      this.language_suggest = ''+this.visitorLanguage+'-'+this.visitorLanguage+'';
    }

    if (this.available_locales[''+visitorCountry+'-'+visitorCountry+'']) {
      this.language_suggest = ''+visitorCountry+'-'+visitorCountry+'';
    }

    if (this.available_locales[this.language_suggest]) {
      this.src = this.domain+this.available_locales[this.language_suggest].slug;
      this.show_language_bar = true;
    }
  }
},
languageBarClose() {
  this.show_language_bar = false;
  createCookie('show_language_bar', 'false', 1);
},
ContinueLanguage() {
  //createCookie('show_language_bar', 'false', 1);
},
ChangeLanguageSuggest(event) {
  this.src = this.domain+this.available_locales[event].slug;
  return false;
},
reactOnScroll() {
  if (this.$el.getBoundingClientRect().top < 1 && window.scrollY > 1) {
    this.hasScrolled = true;
  } else {
    this.hasScrolled = false;
  }
}
}" x-init="reactOnScroll()" @scroll.window="reactOnScroll()">

  const SIGNUP_FORM_URL = "https://api.hsforms.com/submissions/v3/integration/submit/19580542/74eb7d23-67a3-43a9-a65e-b794aa4cc4f9";


function signupForm() {
  return {
    email: "",
    submit() {

      const expression = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/
      const validEmail = expression.test(String(this.email).toLowerCase())

      if (this.email != '') {

        if (! validEmail) {
          console.log('Please enter a valid email address');  
        } else {

        window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
        window.dataLayer.push({
        'formLocation': 'header',
        'event': 'request-freetrial'
        });

        var data = {
          "fields": [
            {
              "objectTypeId": "0-1",
              "name": "email",
              "value": "" + this.email + ""
            },
            {
              "objectTypeId": "0-1",
              "name": "hs_language",
              "value": "en"
            }
          ],
          "context": {
            "hutk": getCookie("hubspotutk"),
            "pageUri": "https://www.shiftbase.com",
            "pageName": "Shiftbase - Workforce management software"
          }
        }
  
        fetch(SIGNUP_FORM_URL, {
          method: "POST",
          headers: {
            "Content-Type": "application/json",
            Accept: "application/json",
          },
          body: JSON.stringify(data),
        })
        .then(() => {
          window.location.href = "https://app.shiftbase.com/signup?language=en&email=" + this.email + "&signup_cta_source=hero-cta&signup_cta_url=https://www.shiftbase.com";
        })
        .catch(() => {
          window.location.href = "https://app.shiftbase.com/signup?language=en&signup_cta_source=hero-cta&signup_cta_url=https://www.shiftbase.com";
        });

        }
      } else {

        window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
        window.dataLayer.push({
        'formLocation': 'header',
        'event': 'request-freetrial'
        });
        
        window.location.href = "https://app.shiftbase.com/signup?language=en&signup_cta_source=hero-cta&signup_cta_url=https://www.shiftbase.com";
      }
    },
  };
}

    @media screen and (min-width: 1280px) {

      #CybotCookiebotDialogDetailBodyContentIABv2Tabs .CybotCookiebotDialogBodyLevelButtonIABContainerToggleHide {

      #CybotCookiebotDialogFooter {

      #CybotCookiebotDialog.CybotEdge #CybotCookiebotDialogFooter .CybotCookiebotScrollArea {

      #CybotCookiebotDialog.CybotEdge #CybotCookiebotDialogFooter #CybotCookiebotDialogBodyButtonsWrapper {
